title: VIDEO: Bombtrack – Welcome Back Sofiane Sehili
content:
In 2020 and 2021, Sofiane was racing Bombtrack bikes. After a 2-year hiatus, Sofiane Sehili is back with the brand. After he picked up his new bike in Nevada, he went for a ride in one of our favorite places in the US: the Mojave and into Death Valley…

The post VIDEO: Bombtrack – Welcome Back Sofiane Sehili appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
